key.name: flyin-direction
key.description: The direction in which the fly in should take place (0 = Up, 1 = Left, 2 = Down, 3 = Right, 4 = User Defined)

key.name: flyin-direction-x
key.description: Direction and Distance X for user defined fly in (-1000 - 1000)

key.name: flyin-direction-y
key.description: Direction and Distance Y for user defined fly in (-1000 - 1000)

key.name: rotatein-direction
key.description: The direction in which the window rotates (1 = Up, 2 = Left, 3 = Down, 4 = Right)

key.name: bounce-max-size
key.description: Maximum scale factor of window when bouncing (1.0 - 3.0)

key.name: bounce-min-size
key.description: Minimum scale factor of window when bouncing (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: bounce-number
key.description: How many bounces during the animation (0 - 10)

key.name: sheet-start-percent
key.description: How wide the beginning of the sheet animation should be compared to the end (1.0 - 150.0)

key.name: fan-angle
key.description: Angle of windows away from the main window (0 - 90)

key.name: expandpw-horiz-first
key.description: If checked, initially expand horizontally, then vertically

key.name: expandpw-initial-horiz
key.description: Number of pixels initially in horizontal direction (0 - 50)

key.name: expandpw-initial-vert
key.description: Number of pixels initially in vertical direction (0 - 50)

key.name: expandpw-delay
key.description: Delay between expanding horizontally and vertically (expressed as a fraction) (0.0 - 1.0)
